arStrings.szText: When you {c_important}Evade{/c} you turn into a cloud of bats, becoming {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|1|]{/c} seconds. Enemies along your path take {c_number}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c}  Physical damage and are inflicted with {c_important}{u}Vampiric Curse.{/u}{/c}  {c_important}Evade's{/c} Cooldown is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.
